short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn off/on your LinkedIn feed with one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eliminate distractions, stay focused and increase your productivity! 
With this extension you can hide/show your LinkedIn feed with just one click.

No Feed For LinkedIn® (nffls) cares about your privacy: no data is collected, stored or sent to external servers.

_____________________________________
Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by or in any way officially connected to LinkedIn Corporation. LinkedIn, the LinkedIn logo, the IN logo and InMail are registered trademarks or trademarks of LinkedIn Corporation.
